jcr:content.jcr:title: List of lighthouses and lightvessels in Germany

contentheadline.headline: List of lighthouses and lightvessels in Germany

contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[lighthouse]]s and [[lightvessel]]s in [[Germany]]'''. == North Sea == [[File:Amrum Leuchtturm 4.jpg|thumb|110px|Amrum lighthouse]] ;[[Schleswig-Holstein]] * [[Amrum Lighthouse|Amrum]] * [[Nebel (Amt Amrum)|Amrum-Nebel]] * [[Bülk lighthouse|Bülk]] * [[Büsum]] * [[Dagebüll lighthouse|Dagebüll]] * [[Heligoland lighthouse|Heligoland]] * [[Leuchtturm Helgoland Düne|Helgoland (Düne)]] * [[Leuchtturm Hörnum|Hörnum]] * [[Kampen lighthouse, Sylt|Kampen]] * [[Leuchtturm List Ost|List Ost]] * [[Leuchtturm List West|List West]] * [[Norddorf]] * [[Oland lighthouse (Germany)|Oland]], Germany's only lighthouse with a thatched roof * [[Olhörn lighthouse|Olhörn]] * [[Pellworm]] * [[Rotes Kliff lighthouse|Rotes Kliff]] * [[St. Peter-Böhl]] * [[Leuchtturm Westerheversand|Westerheversand]] ;[[Hamburg]] [[Image:Neuwerk-Turm.jpg|thumb|110px|Neuwerk lighthouse of 1369.]] * [[Neuwerk]] ;[[Bremen (state)|Bremen]] * [[Bremerhaven lighthouse|Bremerhaven]] * [[Brinkamahof]] ;[[Lower Saxony]] [[File:Pilsumer Leuchtturm 2010-10 CN-I.jpg|thumb|The [[Pilsum Lighthouse|lighthouse of Pilsum]]]] * [[Alte Weser (lighthouse)]] * [[Arngast]] * [[Borkum]] - old lighthouse * [[Borkum Großer Light]] * [[Campen Lighthouse|Campen]] * The [[Kugelbake]] at [[Cuxhaven]] * [[Eckwarden]] * [[Emden]] * [[Hofe]] * [[Hooksielplate]] * [[Imsum]] * [[Knock, Germany|Knock]] * [[Mellumplate]] * [[Memmert]] * [[Minsener Oog Buhne A]] * [[Minsener Oog Buhne C]] * [[Norderney]] * [[Pilsum Lighthouse|Pilsum]] [[File:Leuchtturm roter sand.jpg|thumb|110px|Roter Sand lighthouse in the Weser estuary]] * [[Roter Sand (lighthouse)|Roter Sand]] Außenweser * [[Sandstedt]] * [[Schillig]] * [[Solthörn]] * [[Tossens]] * [[Tegeler Plate]] * [[Voslapp Range Rear Light]] * [[Wangerooge]] (old) * [[Wangerooge]] (new) * [[Wilhelmshaven]] * [[Wybelsum]] == Baltic Sea == [[File:Leuchtturm Buelk 1 2009.jpg|thumb|Bülk lighthouse at the entrance to the Kiel Bay]] ;[[Schleswig-Holstein]] * [[Bülk lighthouse]] * [[Dahme, Schleswig-Holstein|Dahmeshöved]] * [[Eckernförde]] * [[Fehmarnbelt Lightship]], retired since 1985 * Flügge on [[Fehmarn]] * [[Heiligenhafen]] * [[Kalkgrund]] * [[Kiel]] (The lighthouse at Kiel is situated on a platform in the [[Bay of Kiel]]) * [[Kiel-Friedrichsort|Friedrichsort]] * [[Kiel-Holtenau]] * Lübeck - [[Travemünde Lighthouse]] * [[Marienleuchte, Fehmarn]] * [[Neuland (lighthouse)|Neuland Lighthouse]] [[File:Neuland Lighthouse nr Behrensdorf.jpg|thumb|110px|Neuland lighthouse]] * [[Pelzerhaken]] * [[Schleimünde]] * [[Strukkamphuk]] on Fehmarn * [[Staberhuk]] on Fehmarn * [[Westermarkelsdorf]] ;[[Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]] [[File:CapeArkonaLighthouses.jpg|thumb|110px|The two lighthouses of Cape Arkona]] * [[Cape Arkona Lighthouse]] on [[Rügen]] * [[Bastorf]] on the Bukspitze * [[Darß]]er Ort * [[Gollwitz]] * [[Greifswalder Oie]] * [[Gellen]] (on [[Hiddensee]] island) * [[Dornbusch Lighthouse]] (on Hiddensee) * [[Kolliker Ort]] * [[Maltzien]] * [[Peenemünde]] * [[Prora]] * [[Ranzow]]* [[Rostock]] * [[Sassnitz]]-Mukran * Timmendorf on [[Poel]] * [[Ueckermünde]] * [[Warnemünde Lighthouse]] * [[Wustrow, Nordvorpommern|Wustrow]] == Inland seas == [[File:DE Lindau.jpg|thumb|Lindau, Germany's southernmost lighthouse]] ;[[Bavaria]] * [[Lindau Lighthouse]] at the harbour entrance to [[Lindau]] on [[Lake Constance]]. ==Others== ;[[North Rhine-Westphalia]] * Lighthouse of the former [[Helios AG]] for test and research purposes in [[Cologne]] {{Europe topic|List of lighthouses in}} [[Category:Lighthouses in Germany| ]] [[Category:Lists of lighthouses|Germany]] [[Category:Germany transport-related lists|Lighthouses]] [[Category:Lists of buildings and structures in Germany|Lighthouses]]
